= Overview =

As a registered User i want to login to the system

== Corresponding pages ==
 * [PageLogin Login]

= Details =

== Normal Flow ==
 # User enters his username and his password
 # User clicks "Login"
 # User with this username / password combination gets logged in

== Alternative flows ==

=== No  username provided ===
 # User gets redirected to the login page
 # A warning message "Username required!" is displayed

=== No  password provided ===
 # User gets redirected to the login page
 # A warning message "Password required!" is displayed

=== No User with matching username / password found ===
 # User gets redirected to the login page
 # A warning message "Login failed" is displayed
